languages.text: "Доношу до вашего сведения, что третьего дня разгрузку прервал налет банды анверов. В ходе нападения были приведены в негодность три сервитора-грузчика. Также был украден грузовой контейнер, серийный номер — FVDA1-16165, вместе со всем содержимым".

traits.locale_text: "Доношу до вашего сведения, что третьего дня разгрузку прервал налет банды анверов. В ходе нападения были приведены в негодность три сервитора-грузчика. Также был украден грузовой контейнер, серийный номер — FVDA1-16165, вместе со всем содержимым".

languages.text: "I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."
languages.original_text: "Доношу до вашего сведения, что третьего дня разгрузку прервал налет банды анверов. В ходе нападения были приведены в негодность три сервитора-грузчика. Также был украден грузовой контейнер, серийный номер — FVDA1-16165, вместе со всем содержимым".

traits.locale_text: "I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

"I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

"I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

"I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

"I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

languages.text: “我写这这条信息通知你，两天前，安维尔帮袭击了我们，扰乱了我们的卸货工作。在那场袭击中， 三名卸货用机仆被打坏了。另外，还有个编号为FVDA1-16165的集装箱被抢走了，里面的东西也被一起抢走了。”
languages.original_text: "I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

traits.locale_text: “我写这这条信息通知你，两天前，安维尔帮袭击了我们，扰乱了我们的卸货工作。在那场袭击中， 三名卸货用奴工被打坏了。另外，还有个编号为FVDA1-16165的集装箱被抢走了，里面的东西也被一起抢走了。”

languages.text: «Escribo para informar de que hace dos días el proceso de descarga fue interrumpido por un asalto lanzado por la banda de los Anvers. Durante el ataque, tres servidores de carga quedaron inutilizados. Además, el contenedor de carga FVDA1-16165 fue sustraído junto con su contenido».
languages.original_text: "I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

traits.locale_text: «Escribo para informar de que hace dos días el proceso de descarga fue interrumpido por un asalto lanzado por la banda de los Anvers. Durante el ataque, tres servidores de carga quedaron inutilizados. Además, el contenedor de carga FVDA1-16165 fue sustraído junto con su contenido».

languages.text: 「2日前、アンヴァーズ一味による襲撃を受け荷揚げが中断されたことをお知らせするために、これを書いております。襲撃により、3人の積込みサーヴィターが任務を外され、さらに、シリアルナンバーFVDA1-16165の貨物コンテナ1個が中身もろとも盗まれました」
languages.original_text: "I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

traits.locale_text: 「2日前、アンヴァーズ一味による襲撃を受け荷揚げが中断されたことをお知らせするために、これを書いております。襲撃により、3人の積込みサーヴィターが任務を外され、さらに、シリアルナンバーFVDA1-16165の貨物コンテナ1個が中身もろとも盗まれました」

languages.text: "Ich schreibe Ihnen, um Ihnen mitzuteilen, dass die Entladung vor zwei Tagen durch einen Überfall der Anvers-Bande unterbrochen wurde. Bei dem Überfall wurden drei Ladeservitoren außer Gefecht gesetzt. Außerdem wurde ein Frachtcontainer mit der Seriennummer FVDA1-16165 mitsamt seinem Inhalt gestohlen.
languages.original_text: "I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

traits.locale_text: "I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

languages.text: « Je vous écris pour vous informer qu'il y a deux jours, le déchargement a été interrompu par un assaut de la bande des Anver. Trois servitors débardeurs ont été détruits lors de l'attaque. De plus, un conteneur de marchandises, portant le numéro de série FVDA1-16165, a été volé avec son contenu. »
languages.original_text: "I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous écris pour vous informer qu'il y a deux jours, le déchargement a été interrompu par un assaut de la bande des Anver. Trois servitors débardeurs ont été détruits lors de l'attaque. De plus, un conteneur de marchandises, portant le numéro de série FVDA1-16165, a été volé avec son contenu. »

languages.text: "Size, iki gün önce Anver çetesinin düzenlediği bir baskın yüzünden tahliye işleminin kesintiye uğradığını bildirmek için yazıyorum. Saldırıda üç yükleme hizmetörü görev yapamaz hâle geldi. Ayrıca FVDA1-16165 seri numaralı bir kargo konteyneri, içindekilerle birlikte çalındı."
languages.original_text: "I am writing to inform you that two days ago, the discharge was interrupted by a raid launched by the Anvers gang. In the attack, three loader servitors were put out of commission. Furthermore, one cargo container, serial number FVDA1-16165, was stolen along with its contents."

traits.locale_text: "Size, iki gün önce Anver çetesinin düzenlediği bir baskın yüzünden tahliye işleminin kesintiye uğradığını bildirmek için yazıyorum. Saldırıda üç yükleme hizmetörü görev yapamaz hâle geldi. Ayrıca FVDA1-16165 seri numaralı bir kargo konteyneri, içindekilerle birlikte çalındı."
